name: 王貞淑
objective:
邀聘業界專家共同開設就業模擬課程模組，以職場實例進行雙向互動，同時協助同學準備好求職前重要的履歷製作與面試技巧訓練, 並安排行各業職場上的相關部門的人員來與同學分享職場經驗與常見問題，讓同學於就業前即做好準備。

本課程將會於每週依授課內容安排作業，並會花相當多的時間了解自我職涯及企業需求並進行履歷建置與改善。因人數有限，請確認自我時間安排與規劃後再行選課。

Outstanding industrial professional is invited to organize the career simulation program, where scenarios are designed for students to tackle the issues that are possibly faced in the future career. Proper attitude and interpersonal skills at work and be built up through the diversity of themes and scenarios, such as team building, communication and collaboration, and leadership enhancing. The body language and the communicative skills of the students are also strengthened through the programs.
